title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a beautiful woman in a dream

preview.html: Do beautiful women appear in dreams? What is the interpretation of its appearance? Seeing a woman in dreams is one of the most famous visions that many people see, and its meanings are wonderful. I told about seeing ladies in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful woman in a dream for a man: When a man sees a beautiful woman in his dream, this is an indication that he will recover and his circumstances will improve for the better in the coming period of his life, especially if she is an old woman who carries a lot. Beauty.If someone who owes her money sees her in his dream, this is a sign of kindness towards him and that he will be able to pay off all his debts in the next period of his life and it is a symbol of benefiting from him. Trade, or he will find a very good job, which he did not expect in his life, and he will receive income from it, a lot of money. And if he sees her, and she is wearing a white dress for him, then this is a sign that he will get married soon, if he is single, and if he is married, then this is good news. If a man sees that he is walking with a beautiful woman, or that he will hear good news in reality. If a man sees that he is walking with a beautiful woman, some scholars have confirmed that it indicates that his life will become beautiful and happy in the future, and vice versa, if the woman is ugly, this indicates He will be exposed to it. For some problems and obstacles in his future. If he sees her and she is old, this is evidence that he will repent for all the sins he committed in his life, which is sincere repentance and forgiveness from God (the Most High) if the dreamer. He is a sinner or someone who insisted on committing some sins, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the interpretations of dreams that you are looking for. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of a beautiful woman in a dream as a sign of abundant goodness that It will happen in his life in the coming days, which will be very satisfying for him. If one sees a beautiful woman in his dream, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money that will help him live his life the way he likes. If the dreamer sees a beautiful woman in her dream, this It expresses the good news that will reach him in the coming days, which will satisfy him greatly. Seeing the dreamer in his sleep with beautiful women symbolizes that he will obtain a great promotion in his workplace in appreciation of the great efforts he is making to develop it. If a man sees beautiful women in his dream, this is a sign that he will adjust things. Many did not satisfy him at all in the previous days, and he will be more convinced of them later. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful woman in a dream for a single woman: Seeing single women in a dream about beautiful women means that she will receive an offer of marriage from someone who suits her well, and she will agree with him immediately, and she will be very happy in her life with him. If the dreamer sees a beautiful woman in her dream while she is a student, this indicates that she has excelled in her studies and achieved the highest grades that make her proud of herself. If the dreamer sees a beautiful woman in her dream, this expresses the good things that will happen in her life and that she will be very satisfied with. Seeing The dreamer dreams of beautiful women

title: Interpretation of someone combing your hair

preview.html: Interpretation of someone combing your hair in a dream in different situations. Combing in a dream has many meanings and interpretation, and many people ask what is the interpretation of this vision and whether it appears good or bad. Today on our site we will discover an article about the interpretation and interpretation of hairstyle or hair modification in a dream and everything related. With this topic in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of someone combing your hair in a dream (by Ibn Sirin): The great scholar Ibn Sirin, a great scholar of dream interpretation, said that combing hair in a dream indicates great kindness and great joy for the dreamer. Combing hair indicates that the dreamer is a person. Morals and religion, he follows Islamic law and pays zakat in full by the command of God Almighty. A comb in a dream indicates: an insightful, cultured person who reaches high levels of education and all people benefit from him (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he changes you in the shape of his hair and in his external appearance, then this Evidence that the dreamer will face some problems and obstacles in his life and in the field of work, marital life, or family life (and God knows best). Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream: Cutting hair in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be removed from those who want evil and harm to the dreamer, and God Almighty will compensate him. With abundance and wealth, God willing (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he is thinking about combing his hair, this is evidence that the dreamer wants to work in a new job, trade, or project, because combing hair indicates thoughts and their attachment to work (and God knows best). Whoever sees In his dream that he is combing his hair and that the dreamer has long hair, this means that the dreamer spends a lot of time solving his life’s problems and that he is exposed to some problems and obstacles in his life (God is Great). And he knows better). Whoever sees in his dream that his hair is irregular, tangled, and unhealthy, this indicates that the dreamer is a person who is not intelligent enough and cannot organize his life and cannot think and solve the affairs of his life (and God knows best). Interpretation of hair loss in a dream: Whoever sees His dream is that he is combing his hair and his hair falls to the ground, this indicates that the dreamer has grown old and is suffering from illness and disease, and hair loss in a dream indicates illness and weakness. (And God knows best). The appearance of hair in a dream indicates illness and distress for the dreamer, and the emergence of problems in financial life, and he will suffer from poverty (And God knows best). Interpretation of combing hair in a dream for a single woman: Whoever sees in her dream that she is combing her hair, this is evidence that the dreamer She will face some problems and obstacles in her life related to work or marriage. Whoever sees in her dream that she is combing her hair with a silver balloon comb, this indicates that the date of her marriage is close to a person with morals and religion, and he will take her to the highest places in life and education (and God knows best). Interpretation of combing hair. In a dream for a married woman: Combing hair in a dream for a married woman indicates kindness, abundant nutrition, good news, and happiness for her partner, and that God, Blessed and Almighty, will provide her husband with money, successful trade, and a happy life (and God knows best). Whoever sees in her dream that she is combing her hair with a metal comb (iron) This is not good and undesirable, which indicates major problems and obstacles

title: What if I dreamed that I was on a high mountain?  What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?

preview.html: I dreamed that I was on a high mountain, which is an indication of the wonderful results and good condition that the dreamer will achieve, as reaching the top of a mountain despite difficulties and hardships is considered an unparalleled success and achievement, as it symbolizes reaching peaks and achieving difficulties, but falling from a mountain or standing on a sandy mountain It has different interpretations. I dreamed that I was on a high mountain. Standing on a mountain indicates that the dreamer has many praiseworthy qualities. He commits it oblivious to its bad consequences, so he must quickly repent and atone for his sins before it is too late, but for the person who moves between the mountain peaks, his next life will bring him great achievements and successes and a future full of vitality. Happy events and occasions, but standing on the top of a mountain also shows the effort and exhaustion that is written on the person to achieve what is desired. I dreamed that I was on a high mountain by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says: Standing on the top of a high mountain indicates that the dreamer has reached a high level and achieved the desired ambitions, and he has The good that rebukes his conscience for the sins and bad deeds he has committed, and pushes him to repent. There are conflicts within him. I dreamed that I was on a high mountain for single women. The opinions of most commentators agree that an unmarried woman stands on the top of a high mountain, and will soon marry a strong and courageous man, who has all the qualities of masculinity, and will be protected and supported in the future (God willing). As for If she sees someone who knows how to help her reach the top of the mountain, this is evidence that she has good relationships in her life and that the Lord has blessed her with grace. People love her, so she finds help and golden opportunities wherever she goes. Standing on the top of a mountain and looking at the vast green spaces, foretells that a prosperous future awaits her and happy events. I dreamed that I was on a high mountain for a married woman. A wife who sees in a dream that she is standing on the top of a mountain And she looks at him, it means that she is on the verge of salvation from those crises and problems that fill her life and destroy family happiness and stability. And restoring the warm family atmosphere again in her home, but if a married woman sees herself climbing a high mountain with great difficulty until she reaches its summit, this means that she is carrying heavy psychological burdens in her heart, perhaps because of her discomfort with it. The husband because of the many disagreements and the lack of affection and understanding between them, but the wife who sees that she is standing on the top of a green mountain, this indicates that she is a good woman who cares about her domestic affairs and her husband and seeks to provide a safe and suitable environment for raising her children, and she is famous for her kind and pure heart that loves goodness and helps everyone, so She has a praiseworthy status among all those around her. A pregnant woman dreamed that I was on a high mountain. For a pregnant woman to see that she is on top of a high mountain, this is good news that she will end her pregnancy safely and without health problems, as it reassures her that her fetus is in a healthy condition and she does not need these fears about that. It fills her heart and occupies her mind. As for the pregnant woman who sees herself standing on a small height or on a c

title: Interpretation of a dream about an insect entering its hand in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about an insect entering her hand in a dream In case you want to know the dream interpretation of an insect entering her hand in a dream, it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream. If it is a sign of good or evil, the site has reported some interpretations of scholars and workers who have tried to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about an insect entering its hand in a dream: Seeing insects emerging from the body in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is suffering from a major problem with that. Time. Seeing insects under the skin in a dream may indicate intense tension and stress that the dreamer felt during those days. It is possible to see the insect coming out of her hand in a dream, which is a sign of relief from the material difficulties that the owner was facing at that time. The entry of an insect led to Her hand in a dream indicates serious psychological pressures that the dreamer faced in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about entering a house to memorize the Qur’an in a dream Entering a house to memorize the Qur’an in a dream may indicate the wisdom and knowledge that the dreamer enjoyed at that time. And if one sees that he has entered into a role Preservation is due to Salah al-Din and the circumstances of those days. It is possible that seeing her entering a memorial house in a dream may indicate important changes occurring in her life during this period. A dream of entering a memorial house in a dream may indicate material gains that a person will gain through this vision during this period, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about inserting a pin into the leg in a dream: Inserting a pin into the foot may indicate the presence of financial obstacles that the dreamer may face at that time. In the event that someone sees that a pin has been inserted into his foot, this may indicate some problems and difficulties in His life during those days: In the event that a person sees that a pin has been inserted into his foot, this may indicate some family problems that the person with the vision is facing. It is possible that seeing pins in the foot is a sign of distress that the person with the vision may be experiencing at that time, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about worms entering the ear in a dream: In the event that you see worms entering the ear in a dream, it may indicate some rumors that the dreamer is suffering from at that time. Worms entering the ear in a dream may indicate that he heard some disturbing news in those days. Seeing worms entering a person’s ear may indicate that the visionary is interested in people’s words and opinions. Seeing worms entering the ear in a dream may indicate unpleasant events that the dreamer may suffer from during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of entering a military course in a dream: Seeing entering a military course may indicate A military march indicates good changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during those days. In the event that a person sees himself entering a military course in a dream, this may indicate happy events for the dreamer during these days. Seeing yourself entering a military course in a dream could be a sign that may indicate that you You hear happy news during this time, thanks to God. To see yourself entering the military march in a dream may indicate happy events that he may encounter.

title: Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans The interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream by Al-Osaimi dogs indicates many benign events and in some cases watering is not good, and the search for the interpretation of the dream of seeing dogs has increased greatly. Dogs, because they are pets that are very close to humans, because they are friends and loyal to them, and many people want to raise guard dogs, but the interpretation of experts differed in the analysis and in the interpretation and clarification of the symbols and hints that they indicate. Dogs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a Al-Asami dog. Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream. Hunting: It indicates that the dreamer is a person surrounded by many enemies. Also, seeing dogs chasing the dreamer in a dream means that he is committing many sins. A dog attack in a dream and an attempt to harm the fortuneteller is evidence that the disgraced person is planning revenge. Interpretation of seeing a single dog Al-OsaimiIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is raising a dog At home, this indicates the tenderness and kindness that characterizes them. Domestic dogs, when you see them inside the house in a dream, are a sign of good luck and an abundance of goodness. Interpretation of seeing dogs in a married woman’s dream by Al-Asimi. Seeing a married woman barking dogs in a dream means that there is an evil man in He wants to harm her and is trying to destroy her life. Seeing dogs in a married woman’s dream also indicates that there are people who wish her to fail in her life. As for seeing a group of dogs running after her, it shows that there are people in her life who wish her harm and are very angry with her. Seeing a married woman in a dream Where dogs eat their meat means that they are exposed to many problems and worries. But if he sees himself mingling with dogs in a dream, this indicates that he heard some good news. Interpretation of guide dogs for pregnant women: Seeing a pregnant woman chasing dogs in a dream means that there is a malicious woman in her life who is trying to destroy her home. As for black dogs in a pregnant woman’s dream, there are relatives who do not love this woman. Interpretation of a man’s vision of a dog. If a man sees white dogs in a dream, this indicates the presence of enemies in his life, but God saves him from them. A black dog in a dream indicates hatred and jealousy. Add the dream that you want to interpret by referring to The family situation is in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing hay in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing hay in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing hay in a dream has many meanings. His sight can be a sign of good or a harbinger of evil. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing hay in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing hay in a dream based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Sirin. Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing straw in a dream? Seeing hay in a dream indicates that the viewer will be blessed with a lot of money as a reward for his works and efforts in life. Seeing hay in the house in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness and livelihood. And blessings in his life. I see myself eating hay in a dream. It indicates that unpleasant things will happen to the fortuneteller. Seeing storing straw in a dream indicates that the prices of goods will rise in the coming period. Seeing wheat straw in a dream It indicates that the coming period of the dreamer’s life will be full of goodness and stability. See also: Interpretation of an orphan sponsor in a dream. What is Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing straw in a dream? Seeing hay in a dream indicates that the viewer will obtain large profits and gains. Seeing white hay on the surface of the water in a dream shows that there are bad people in the dreamer’s life who always envy and hate him. Seeing Green hay in a dream refers to the dreamer who is starting a different stage in his life and meeting new people. See also: Interpretation of seeing rice straw in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing hay in a single woman’s dream? A woman seeing hay alone in a dream shows that happy things will happen in her life. Seeing Women alone in hay fields in a dream indicates that her psychological state has improved during this period and her desire to start over. Seeing an unmarried woman entering a place full of hay in a dream shows that he will get married soon. Seeing his fiancée burning hay in a dream indicates that there are many disagreements between her and her fiancé, which will It will lead to the engagement being broken. Seeing a married woman with straw in a dream indicates that her financial and family conditions will improve for the better during this period. Seeing a married woman adopting a house in a dream shows that she is a strong woman. Able to perform the tasks assigned to her to the fullest extent. Seeing a married woman with hay around her everywhere in a dream indicates her husband’s diligence and efforts in his work to improve their financial situation. Vision A pregnant woman's strawberries in a dream indicates the health of herself and her fetus. Seeing a pregnant woman eating hay in a dream indicates that she will face some health problems during the birth process. Seeing a pregnant woman eating hay in a dream indicates a deterioration in her health and the health of her fetus, which may reach danger during this period.

title: I dreamed that I was a bride without a dress for a married woman

preview.html: I dreamed that I was a bride without a dress for a married woman through one of the sites Looking at the roy2a.com website, the customs and traditions of marriage and weddings differ according to custom. One of the most widespread customs in most countries in wedding ceremonies is for the bride to wear a white dress symbolizing that she is the owner of the night and the bride and when. Seeing a wedding without a dress is considered a disturbing vision for the owner of the vision in different circumstances, because she feels that something is missing or that the subject is strange, so we will explain the most important interpretations that came from great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin. And Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen on this topic, so follow us. I dreamed that I was a bride without a dress. Seeing an unmarried woman getting married without a wedding dress in a dream is an indication of the end of her engagement to her or her distance from someone close to her. Seeing the loss of a wedding dress in a dream indicates that a married woman is going through marital problems and disputes due to poor financial conditions and dissatisfaction with life. Seeing the loss of a wedding dress for an unmarried woman in a dream in the event of losing a job opportunity, marriage, or canceling a trip. As for seeing the search for a wedding dress in a single woman’s dream? It indicates the desire to get married. The bride crying on her wedding day in a dream is a good vision that indicates positive changes in various aspects of life. Seeing the bride’s trousseau lost in a dream indicates judgments and not good news coming to the seer. The bride without a dress in a dream is considered a bad vision that portends the emergence of things that cause sadness and anxiety for the dreamer. I dreamed that I was a bride without a dress and that I was single The dream indicates that something bad will happen that will cause you sadness and anger. Seeing a wedding in a single dream without people is no other sign of the psychological comfort and tranquility that she is going through during this period of her life. As for watching a noisy wedding and dancing, the presence of many people and confusion in a person's dream indicates the problems and crises that she will face in her life in the near future. title: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream a bad shape, this indicates the problems she sees in her diet in goodness and nutrition. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried woman dreams that she was helping a pregnant woman at her time, and tried not to tire her with her personal affairs in the dream. This indicates that this dreamer will witness many beautiful days to come. In which she will live happily and happily for a long time, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she saw a pregnant woman, but she was in bad condition and was not beautiful in the dream, and her smell was bad. It may indicate some problems that this dreamer will face in her life. And they will suffer from them for a long time. Likewise, seeing an unmarried girl in a dream helped her a lot to a pregnant woman and she knew her well in the dream and was happy to do these things for her. The dream shows the charitable works that this dreamer will do in her life. And that God Almighty gives her goodness and strength in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that she was helping a pregnant woman at her time Her birth in a dream and trying to meet her needs. This indicates the great help that this married woman provides in her life to many of those close to her. If a married woman dreams that a pregnant woman is trying to approach her, and she was bad in appearance and smell, and she was afraid of her. It shows that the dreamer will face many problems. And things that are not good in her life, but she will succeed in staying away from them in her life. A married woman also saw in a dream that he saw a beautiful pregnant woman in her appearance and smell, and was happy with her presence in the dream. The meaning may indicate that this married woman will witness many days in the future full of goodness and living for her and her children. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman sees in a dream that a pregnant woman is approaching her. And asks her for help in many of her private affairs in a dream. It may mean that this divorced woman will do many good things. And full of goodness in her life and that God will send her goodness and food, God willing. Likewise, the divorced woman in a dream that an evil woman was pregnant and tried to ask her for help in a dream, and she did not accept her help in the dream. It indicates a big problem that was about to come to this divorced woman in Her life. But he will succeed in getting rid of her. And that the vision of the divorced woman in a dream of a very beautiful woman who was pregnant and succeeded in giving birth to a beautiful girl in the dream. The dream indicates that God Almighty will change the condition of this divorced woman from bad to better and more beautiful. She will live in eternal happiness. title: Interpretation of a dream about eating chestnuts for a woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about eating chestnuts, as chestnuts are one of the most famous sweets in the Arab world, especially in the winter, because they are warm winter sweets that warm a person from the cold of winter and there are many different ways to make them in terms of boiling or even baking them, and today through our article we will learn about them. Interpretation of a dream about eating Chestnuts.Interpretation of a dream about eating chestnuts. Interpreters also explained that if the dreamer sees chestnut candy in a dream, this means many different matters that a person must have a high level of care, attention and patience. In any case, chestnut candy is one of the most important things used by a fortune teller, and it is also one of the clearest signs that you will meet your partner in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about chestnuts for a woman in a dream The interpretation of a dream varies from one person to another, as it depends on the dreamer whether he is a woman, a man, or Single or married, and therefore according to what scholars have stated, the interpretation of the dreamer seeing chestnuts, especially for women, is as follows: Chestnuts indicate good health and well-being for the dreamer, in addition to being a sign of a largely stable financial condition. If the dreamer sees himself picking chestnuts from the tree, this is a sign On the imminent joy that he will see. But if he eats something from the chestnuts, he will receive goodness and pleasure. Roasted chestnuts in a dream indicate the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations. If the dreamer sees himself holding candy chestnuts in his hands, we find that this is an indication of a lot of material damage to the company in which he works. out, but there is some good news ahead. Chestnuts can be a clear indication of meeting a very reliable business partner, who will be the beneficiary of the enterprise and the company as a whole. If an unmarried woman dreams of chestnuts and eats them with pleasure and joy, this is evidence that there is a promising relationship for her in The future is from a wealthy man. See also: Interpretation of a dream about hair lice for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about eating chestnuts in a dream. There are many interpretations that scholars have differed on regarding eating chestnuts, and most interpretations of eating chestnuts are as follows: If the dreamer eats chestnuts while roasting them with other foods, then this A sign of anxiety and staring, but it may also be another sign of well-being, happiness, and having a good time. One of the interpretation scholars, especially Ibn Shaheen, said that if the dreamer sees himself holding a chestnut in his hand, it is evidence of humility in work on the one hand, and on the other hand it is evidence of... Magic and vitality. An adventurous companion in life in general. Seeing in a dream sweet chestnuts. We find that seeing sweet chestnuts in a dream indicates many different positive things, the most important of which are: Happiness, joy, and pleasure largely overshadow the dreamer’s life. Proof of the desire to have children if the dreamer is married. It also indicates Indicates that human problems will end one way or another, whether at the family level or even at the societal level. In other words, this indicates many unpleasant events. Seeing cooked chestnuts in a dream

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a mountain in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a mountain in a dream: Anyone who sees a mountain in his dream may feel fear, as the mountain is characterized by its high height, which makes the dreamer wonder about the interpretations of this vision and whether it indicates good or bad? Scientists answered this question with different interpretations, depending on the vision. The sleeper can see that he is sitting on the top of a green mountain. In this case, the interpretation is praiseworthy, while the dreamer falling from a mountain could portend bad luck, which is why we will examine in this article all the evidence of seeing a mountain in a dream, whether negative or positive. Seeing a mountain in a dreamIn the interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream, scholars provide The following: Ibn Sirin agrees with Sheikh Al-Nabulsi that seeing a mountain in a dream symbolizes a high status and prestige. Ibn Shaheen says that the interpretation of a dream about sitting on the top of a mountain in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s high status. Climbing a mountain in a dream indicates the pursuit of knowledge and movement. Towards achieving goals and ambitions. Seeing a mountain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a mountain in a dream, there are many different connotations that can be good or bad, such as: Ibn Sirin says: Whoever sees himself ascending a mountain in a dream is in glory, and as for Descending means humiliation, sadness, and loss. Ibn Sirin refers to the mountain in a dream with the sultan, king, or president, and since one of the characteristics of the mountain is that it is solid and strong, seeing it in a dream may indicate a cruel ruler or a dreamer who must be subjugated. To injustice in his life. Seeing the dreamer sitting in the shade of a mountain in his dream shows his luck in meeting important people who will help him in his work. Seeing the dreamer climbing a mountain and then suddenly falling down is a sign of his lack of religion and his stopping performing some acts of worship such as prayer, charity, etc. If a traveler sees On a flight, a mountain rises during his sleep, so he must slow down his speed and postpone the trip to avoid any risks. Seeing a mountain in a dream for a single womanIt is not bad for a single woman to see a mountain in her dream, but the signs are desirable, such as: A girl who climbs the top of a mountain in her dream indicates Success, whether in her studies or in her professional life. Seeing a mountain in an unmarried woman’s dream may symbolize her marriage to an important figure in society. If an unmarried woman dreams that her father is climbing to the top of a mountain and feels tired, this is a sign of his efforts to provide her with a decent life. Seeing a mountain in a dream for a married woman. A mountain in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her life and home, whether stable or not, and in the interpretations of jurists we find the following: Seeing a married woman sitting with her husband on the top of a mountain shows their marital happiness and the extent of love and understanding between them. If the married woman She dreams of climbing a mountain, as she is a woman who is skilled in managing the affairs of her home and always deals with situations with wisdom and composure. The fear of seeing a mountain in a wife’s dream symbolizes her fear for her children and their future. Seeing a mountain in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a mountain in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates her health, and the enjoyment of luxury. A healthy body, and a good pregnancy period without any
